displayName.japanese: この世には２種類の人間がいる

description.english: Complete the game with more than 20000 gold collected in total.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel mit mehr als 20.000 Goldstücken ab.
description.french: Termine le jeu en ayant ramassé plus de 20 000 pièces d'or.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con più di 20.000 monete d’oro raccolte in tutto.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con más de 20.000 unidades de oro en total.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, собрав в общей сложности более чем 20 000 золота.
description.japanese: 金を2万個以上あつめながらゲームをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę, zebrawszy łącznie 20 000 sztuk złota.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot összesen több mint 20000 összegyűjtött arannyal.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo com mais de 20000 em ouro coletado ao todo.

displayName.italian: Più veloce di un cespuglio rotolante
displayName.spanish: Más rápido que una planta rodadora
displayName.brazilian: Mais Rápido Que Uma Bola de Feno

description.english: Complete the game in less than 2 hours, 30 minutes.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel in weniger als 2 Stunden und 30 Minuten ab.
description.french: Termine le jeu en moins de deux heures et trente minutes.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in meno di 2 ore e 30 minuti.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en menos de 2 horas y 30 minutos.
description.russian: Пройдите игру менее чем за 2 часа, 30 минут.
description.japanese: 2時間30分以内にゲームをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę w mniej niż 2,5 godziny
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot 2 és fél óra alatt.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo game in less than 2 hours, 30 minutes.

displayName.english: Shine on, You Crazy Round Thing
displayName.italian: Brilla come non mai, folle rotondità
displayName.spanish: Brillante como el sol del desierto
displayName.hungarian: Csillogj csak te őrült kerek izé

description.english: Complete the game with more than 150 orbs collected in total.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel mit mehr als 150 Kugeln ab.
description.french: Termine le jeu en ayant ramassé plus de 150 sphères.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con più di 150 globi raccolti in tutto.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con más de 150 orbes en total.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, собрав в общей сложности более 150 сфер.
description.japanese: オーブを１５０個以上あつめながらゲームをクリアする
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot összesen több mint 150 összegyűjtött gömbbel.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo com mais de 150 orbes coletadas ao todo.

description.english: Complete the game without getting killed once.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel ab, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Termine le jeu sans mourir une seule fois.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza essere mai ucciso.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin que te maten ni una sola vez.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, ни разу не погибнув.
description.japanese: 一度も壊れずにゲームをクリアする
description.polish: Przejdź grę, nie ginąc ani razu.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot egyetlen halál nélkül.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem morrer nenhuma vez.

description.english: Get all four gold stars in the same playthrough.
description.german: Erziele alle vier Goldsterne in einem Spiel.
description.french: Obtiens les quatre étoiles d'or dans la même partie.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte e quattro le stelle d’oro nella stessa partita.
description.spanish: Consigue las cuatro estrellas de oro en la misma sesión de juego.
description.russian: Получите все четыре золотые звезды за одно прохождение игры.
description.japanese: １度のプレイでゴールドスターを４つゲットする
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie cztery złote gwiazdki podczas jednej gry.
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg mind a négy aranycsillagot egyetlen végigjátszás alatt.
description.brazilian: Consiga as quatro estrelas douradas num único jogo.

description.english: Defeat 10 trilobites before they wake up.
description.french: Tue 10 trilobites avant qu'ils ne se réveillent.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 mostriciattoli prima che si sveglino.
description.spanish: Elimina a 10 trilobites antes de que se despierten.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 трилобитов, прежде чем они проснутся.
description.japanese: トリロバイトが覚醒する前に１０匹やっつける
description.brazilian: Derrote 10 trilobitas antes que eles acordem.

displayName.japanese: 続・夕陽の採掘ロボット

description.english: Defeat 10 shiners before they wake up.
description.french: Tue 10 clandestins avant qu'ils ne se réveillent.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 luminari prima che si sveglino.
description.spanish: Elimina a 10 Brillantes antes de que se despierten.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 бомжей, прежде чем они проснутся.
description.japanese: ゾンビが覚醒する前に１０匹やっつける
description.brazilian: Derrote 10 bebuns antes que eles acordem.

displayName.japanese: 新・夕陽の採掘ロボット

description.english: Defeat 10 mecha trilobites before they wake up.
description.french: Tue 10 trilobites mécaniciens avant qu'ils ne se réveillent.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 mostriciattoli meccanici prima che si sveglino.
description.spanish: Elimina a 10 mecha trilobites antes de que se despierten.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 механических трилобитов, прежде чем они проснутся.
description.japanese: メカロバイトが覚醒する前に１０匹やっつける
description.brazilian: Derrote 10 mecha trilobitas antes que eles acordem.

description.english: Destroy two generators before entering Vectron.
description.german: Zerstöre zwei Generatoren, bevor du Vectron betrittst.
description.french: Détruis deux générateurs avant d'entrer dans Vectron.
description.italian: Distruggi due generatori prima di accedere a Vectron.
description.spanish: Destruye dos generadores antes de entrar en Vectron.
description.russian: Уничтожьте два генератора, прежде чем входить в Вектрон.
description.japanese: 探求の深層に入る前にジェネレーターを２つ壊す
description.polish: Zniszcz dwa generatory przed wejściem do Vectronu.
description.hungarian: Pusztíts el két generátort, mielőtt belépnél Vektronba.
description.brazilian: Destrua dois geradores antes de entrar em Vectron.

description.english: You found the Old World!
description.german: Du hast die Old World gefunden!
description.french: Tu as trouvé le Old World !
description.italian: Hai trovato Old World!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado el Old World!
description.russian: Вы нашли Старый мир!
description.japanese: 太古の地層を発見！
description.polish: Udało ci się znaleźć Stary Świat!
description.brazilian: Você achou o Velho Mundo!

description.english: You found Vectron!
description.french: Tu as trouvé Vectron !
description.italian: Hai trovato Vectron!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado Vectron!
description.russian: Вы нашли Вектрон!
description.japanese: 探求の深層を発見！
description.brazilian: Você achou Vectron!

displayName.japanese: もろくて強いスチームロボットよ、永遠なれ

description.english: Immortalization of a destructible steambot.
description.french: Le robot que tu pouvais détruire est maintenant immortel.
description.italian: Come immortalare uno Steambot distruttibile.
description.spanish: Inmortalización de un robot a vapor destructible.
description.russian: Обессмерчивание бренного стимбота.
description.japanese: タンブルトンにラスティの像がたつ
description.brazilian: Imortalização de um vaporibot destrutível.

description.english: You found Archaea!
description.french: Tu as trouvé Archaea !
description.italian: Hai trovato Archea!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado Archaea!
description.russian: Вы нашли Архею!
description.japanese: 荒野の鉱床を発見！
description.brazilian: Você achou Archaea!

displayName.french: Miam, de la soupe de tortue !
displayName.japanese: おいしいタートルスープのつくりかた

description.english: Defeat a turtle submerged in water.
description.french: Tue une tortue immergée dans l'eau.
description.italian: Sconfiggi una tartaruga immersa in acqua.
description.spanish: Acaba con un tortuga sumergida en agua.
description.russian: Уничтожьте черепаху, погруженную в воду.
description.japanese: タートルを水に沈めてやっつける
description.hungarian: Győzz le egy vízbe merült teknőst.
description.brazilian: Derrote uma tartaruga submersa em água.

displayName.japanese: コミュニティ・サポート

description.english: Buy from all of Tumbleton's shops.
description.german: Kauf in allen Läden Tumbletons ein.
description.french: Achète quelque chose dans tous les magasins de Tumbleton.
description.italian: Fai acquisti presso tutti i negozi di Tumbleton.
description.spanish: Compra en todas las tiendas de Tumbleton.
description.russian: Сделайте покупки во всех магазинах Тамблтона.
description.japanese: 装備をすべてタンブルトンの町から調達する
description.brazilian: Compre de todas as lojas de Tumbleton.

description.english: Crush 10 enemies with falling blocks.
description.french: Écrase 10 ennemis sous des blocs tombant.
description.italian: Schiaccia 10 nemici con la caduta dei blocchi.
description.spanish: Aplasta a 10 enemigos con bloques.
description.russian: Раздавите 10 врагов падающими булыжниками.
description.japanese: 落石で敵を１０体やっつける
description.brazilian: Esmague 10 inimigos com blocos em queda.

displayName.japanese: 『ハーフライフ』続編制作決定！？

description.english: Find and sell 8 Uranium ores at the same time.
description.french: Trouve et vends 8 minerais d'Uranium en même temps.
description.italian: Trova e vendi 8 minerali di uranio contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Encontrar y vender 8 unidades de Uranio al mismo tiempo.
description.russian: Найдите и за один раз продайте 8 грузов Урана.
description.japanese: ウラニウムを８つ見つけていっぺんに売る
description.polish: Znajdź i sprzedaj naraz 8 kawałków rudy uranu.
description.hungarian: Kutass fel és adj el egyszerre 8 urániumércet.
description.brazilian: Encontre e venda 8 minérios de Urânio ao mesmo tempo.

displayName.french: Ce n'est un secret pour personne
displayName.japanese: ミンナニ　ナイショダヨ

description.english: Find all secret areas in the caves.
description.german: Finde alle Geheimgebiete in den Höhlen.
description.french: Trouve toutes les zones secrètes des souterrains.
description.italian: Trova tutte le zone segrete nelle grotte.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las zonas secretas de las cuevas.
description.russian: Найдите все секретные области в пещерах.
description.japanese: 洞窟のなかにある隠された場所をすべて見つけだす
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie ukryte obszary w jaskiniach.
description.hungarian: Találd meg az összes titkos helyet a barlangokban.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as áreas secretas nas cavernas.

description.english: Find and sell 16 Dark Matter ores at the same time.
description.french: Trouve et vends 16 minerais de Matière Noire en même temps.
description.italian: Trova e vendi 16 minerali di materia oscura contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Encontrar y vender 16 unidades de Materia oscura al mismo tiempo.
description.russian: Найдите и за один раз продайте 16 грузов Темной материи.
description.japanese: １６個のダークマターを見つけていっぺんに売る
description.polish: Znajdź i sprzedaj naraz 16 kawałków rudy ciemnej materii.
description.hungarian: Kutass fel és adj el egyszerre 16 sötét anyagot.
description.brazilian: Encontre e vend 16 minérios de Matéria Escura ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Maximize all upgrades.
description.french: Effectue toutes les mises à jour.
description.italian: Massimizza tutti i miglioramenti.
description.spanish: Pon todas las mejoras al máximo.
description.russian: До максимума улучшите все модификации.
description.japanese: すべての装備を最大限にアップグレードする
description.brazilian: Maximize todas as melhorias.

displayName.english: 99 Problems and the Box Ain't One
displayName.french: 99 problèmes et ce n'en est pas un
displayName.italian: 99 problemi e la cassetta non è uno di essi
displayName.spanish: 99 problemas, pero la caja no es uno de ellos.
displayName.japanese: ぼくには９９の問題があるけど、ボックスはその限りではない
displayName.polish: 99 problemów, ale pudło nie jest jednym z nich
displayName.hungarian: 99 probléma, de a doboz nem az
displayName.brazilian: 99 Problemas e a Caixa Não É Um Deles

description.english: Destroy a laser box.
description.french: Détruis un laser.
description.italian: Distruggi una cassetta laser.
description.spanish: Destruye una caja láser.
description.russian: Уничтожьте лазерный куб.
description.japanese: レーザーボックスを壊す
description.brazilian: Destruir uma caixa laser.

description.english: Reach the bottom of the world.
description.french: Trouve le bout du monde sous-terrain.
description.italian: Raggiungi la parte più bassa del mondo.
description.spanish: Alcanza el fondo del mundo.
description.russian: Дойдите до дна мира.
description.japanese: 地底に到達
description.brazilian: Chegar no fundo do mundo.

description.english: Dig out 15000 tiles.
description.french: Déterre 15000 carreaux.
description.italian: Porta alla luce 15.000 mattonelle.
description.spanish: Saca a la luz 15.000 fichas.
description.russian: Выкопайте 15 000 плиток.
description.japanese: ブロックを１万５千破壊する
description.brazilian: Cavar 15000 quadros.

description.english: Find and sell 8 Trashium ores at the same time.
description.french: Trouve et vends 8 minerais d'Ordurium en même temps.
description.italian: Trova e vendi 8 minerali di rifiutonio contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Encontrar y vender 8 unidades de Basurium al mismo tiempo.
description.russian: Найдите и за один раз продайте 8 грузов Мусория.
description.japanese: ８種類のゴミニウムを見つけていっぺんに売る
description.polish: Znajdź i sprzedaj naraz 8 kawałków rudy śmiecium.
description.hungarian: Kutass fel és adj el egyszerre 8 limlomumércet.
description.brazilian: Encontre e venda 8 minérios de Entúlio ao mesmo tempo.
